title: What Cantor's Defeat Means For Immigration
teaser: House Majority Leader Eric Cantor was seen to be open to some aspects of immigration reform.
contentencoded:
House Majority Leader Eric Cantor has lost the Republican primary in Virginia to Tea Party-backed candidate David Brat. Cantor was seen to be open to some aspects of immigration reform.

Univision anchor and correspondent Enrique Acevedo joins Here & Now’s Jeremy Hobson to discuss what Cantor’s defeat could mean for immigration reform.

Guest

  • Enrique Acevedo, anchor and correspondent for Univision. He tweets @Enrique_Acevedo.
